name: Crashy Laps
description:
Description


Crashy Laps is a game to enjoy driving and overtaking aggressively where collisions and foul play are common, with a maximum of 4 Players. 20 little and funny tracks are waiting for you.



In Single Player mode, you can also compete to reach the Best Time in the Leaderboard of each track.



Features


  • Use one or more Gamepads 🎮, or Keyboard ⌨️: you can use Keyboard for playing a maximum of 2 players at the same time.
  • 4 Settings for each part of day: Morning, Midday ☀, Evening 🌄 and Night 🌛.
  • 4 Competitions: Time Trial, Quick Race, Grand Prix and Championship.
  • 4 Areas with their own settings: road grip, environment, terrain types, etc.
  • 4 Tracks for each Area: 16 Tracks + 4 Track variants.
  • 3 AI 🤖 Difficulties: Novice, Professional and Expert.
  • 2 selectable Camera Views: Isometric or Top-down. Zoom in or out to adjust screen for aspects ratio from 4:3 until 21:9.
  • 2 selectable Engine Sounds: Combustion or Electric.
  • Customization: customize the number and the car colours.



Competitions


  • Time Trial 🏎️: play in Single Player mode and try to reach your Best Time and the World Record for each track.
  • Quick Race, from 🏎️🏎️ to 🏎️🏎️🏎️🏎️: play a 4 laps race.
  • Grand Prix 🏎️🏎️🏎️🏎️: play a Grand Prix with a qualifying lap for each player and 4 laps race.
  • Championship 🏎️🏎️🏎️🏎️: play a Championship competing in the 4 Tracks of the selected Area and reach the Championship Cups by the selected difficulty.

Zones


  • Candy Lands: drive in a sweet world where the mud is chocolate, on simple roads great for beginners.
  • Alpine Bridge: drive in an alpine area, always crossing bridges and tunnels.
  • Silver Dunes: drive in a desert area, on rough and uneven roads.
  • Frosty Way: drive in an icy area surrounded by snowy mountains, on slippery and twisty roads.



  • Around the World: drive in a tracks selection of the previous areas, with some changes.
